titleStmt.title: The justification of a safe and wel-grounded answer to the Scottish papers, printed under the name of Master Chaloner his speech: which, (whatsoever the animadvertor affirmes) doth maintaine the honour of the Parliament, and interest of the kingdome of England. Novemb. 23. 1646. Appointed to be printed, according to an order of the House of Commons.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Parliament. House of Commons.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
